attributes.action: Replace the new expenses system costing 6 million with a simple publication of expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 11 Feb it was announced that a new system to police politician's expenses was going to cost £6 million (6 x more than any expenses repaid). 
This seems to be unnecessary and a simpler system (e.g. publishing expenses for public scrutiny with clear rules) will be better and cheaper. 
Politicians will then police themselves at virtually no cost, knowing that any excess claims will be openly published.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
